text: oba dæhæmi dæya kirīmaṭa hō pariśuddhavantayin bavaṭa pat vīmaṭa hō minisun atarē sāmādānaya kara tæbīmaṭa hō obaṭa bādhāvak vaśayen pat viya hæki andamaṭa (oba karana) obagē divrumaṭa allāhva ǣn̆dā noganu. allāh (divrumaṭa) savan denneku vaśayenda, (sithi æti dæya) hon̆din danneku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
